website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and portable while still being durable, this USB plug-and-play digital microscope also functions as an endoscope, providing up to 200x magnification.
pros: Takes clear photos and records video smoothly, capturing an item's true colors
Adjustable LED lighting, and users can add their own light source for even more illumination
Included attachments allow users to view inside ears and mouths
Can attach scope to base or use freehand
cons: Costs more than many comparable digital microscopes
Magnification not as good for examining very small things, such as plant cells

customer_reviews.title: Not professional quality, but not terrible for under $100
customer_reviews.text: This microscope is great for what it is, but please keep in mind it's under $100. I use this to get close up shots of the medical marijuana I've been prescribed. Not only is it fascinating to look at, but it also helps to check for any undesirable additions to my medicine (mold, bugs, hairs, etc). It's main failing is that everything not directly centered gets a very heavy bokeh (out of focus) effect. At maximum magnification, there's a slight pink tinge around the outside of the image. But again, this is a $90 USB scope, not a high end one. You get what you pay for, and this is not a bad value.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: One Awesome instrument.
customer_reviews.text: This is a finely tuned instrument, definitely not a toy. High resolution images of my stamps show every detail, down to the "hidden " details of similar stamps. Definitely recommend to everyone who needs a high resolution microscope. Problems: just call the number on the box.
customer_reviews.author: R. Neville

customer_reviews.title: Most versatile USB microscope
customer_reviews.text: I picked up one of these originally as a supplemental scope. It was so useful, it became my primary! I repair complex mechanisms, mechanical watches, PCB work, microsoldering, you name it! This scope works with the default Windows 10 camera app as well. I highly recommend this microscope, it's useful and has a fairly decent working distance.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good Scope, Bad Software
customer_reviews.text: The camera/scope works well. However the software is unbelievably bad. A quick check online yielded a much better software package. Now I am very satisfied with the hardware. The little aluminum stand is very handy and well made. Unlike the flexible neck ones on other scopes, this holds steady at high mag. That is what is most important.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kreidler

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: I had limited expectations for something at this price point, considering that some microscope cameras cost 5x this amount. But I took a gamble and bought this for looking at ants. Wow. The first picture i took really impressed me. Very high quality for this low price. I did not need to install any software, but Windows10 immediately recognized it. 2 minutes out of the box and I was working with the pictures. I am very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scope for coins and many other uses also
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing and trying and returning 5 different microscopes, I finally found a keeper. A sturdy quality base an outstanding camera with great details in the picture along with the ease of use delivered by this product I would reccomend this microscope to all ages. I use it for coins and finally have the tool I've been looking for. I have an adapter coming today to use with my phone so hopefully it's just as easy as it was with my computer I got two hands too give this product 2 thumbs up..
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've tried
customer_reviews.text: This is the third camera I've tried and it is by far the best. The stand is solid, nicely adjustable, and well made. Unlike many of the cameras on the market, this camera will focus at any distance by just moving the end closer or farther away from the object being observed. You can go from basically a webcam to a microscope just by moving the camera. I use it primarily for SMD soldering and it's perfect for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Juric

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware - archaic capture software
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid piece of gear that assembles in minutes as is convenient to use to position the camera for best focus. LEDs are adequately bright, but use a neutral background - gray paper - rather than the metal base when imaging. Get this - they include a **CD** in the box! Heh. But there's a URL included in the instructions where you can download a piece of primitive capture software that works adequately, but it doesn't remember the "save" folder for your images the next time it's put in use. Sheesh. So... 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JP Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: This microscope is the best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This microscope is the best bang for the buck. I purchased one to use for inspection of laser processing on microelectronic devices at my workplace and was amazed at the performance. That day, I purchased one for myself. It provided lab photos that performed as well as very expensive and bulky optical microscopes. I love the built in dimmable LED lighting. I would pay twice as much if it had four pairs of dimmable LEDs (R, G, B, UV) and had thickness increments marked on the focusing stage knob for measuring thickness. Our company purchased more of them for desk top inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Rad

customer_reviews.title: I don't think there's a better USB microscope / camera out there
customer_reviews.text: I don't think there's a better USB microscope / camera out there. This device has helped me discern the microscopically-printed part numbers on the various surface-mounted parts mounted on the circuit boards I inspect at my desk. The variable lighting is very handy for establishing just the right contrast for viewing and photographing the results. I would buy this again and I recommend it to anyone with a need for a serious and portable microscope with great adaptibility and ruggedness.
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great pics, great price, great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price! I've been using for almost a year, my company repairs dental equipment with very, very small parts. We are able to do R&D on the parts and help us diagnose repairs. We can zoom close enough to see machining marks on the gears!! Very impressive. I had an issue with my camera in the first year. I contacted the vendor and received excellent customer service as well. Very quick response time. They helped me troubleshoot and when we determined the camera was bad they had a replacement to me in a few days. Looking to buy more as a result of this service.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Most of the reviewers have dealt with the scope itself. I want to address the company's customer service. It is excellent. While moving to a new domicile, I broke the software disc. It was replaced gratis (even though I offered to pay for a replacement); and sent to me via priority mail. I can think of very few businesses that would go to those lengths to satisfy a customer.
customer_reviews.author: tojodro

customer_reviews.title: and found this to be a very good bargain. The imaging is quite good
customer_reviews.text: I have evaluated this microscope against two other products, and found this to be a very good bargain. The imaging is quite good, but I am especially pleased with the rigidness of the stage for the price. The images below are of the halftone dots in a catalog and of the "Wikipedia" icon on a KindleFire. Both images were taken with a field of view of about 2 mm, which is the highest magnification.
customer_reviews.author: John Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Great for selling coins online!
customer_reviews.text: So far this scope/camera does exactly what I expected. I just need to surround the scope with better lighting of the coin I intend to sell. UPDATE; I returned this and tried a few others. After some failures, I ordered this one again. It really does a great job. Acquiring proper lighting is the big problem and not the fault of the scope/camera.
customer_reviews.author: Hayes B.

customer_reviews.title: For the money it's good
customer_reviews.text: (Win 7 64) It's great for flat objects like paper money, etc. But very little depth of field especially at higher mag levels. Cable is sturdy but stiff, so moving it slightly causes cam to move which disturbs the picture. Knobs for raising and lowering the camera are loose fitting and the clamp holding the camera itself does not snug evenly to the cylinder of the camera. This allows for a less than positive hold. The platform could also use more weight for more stability. Aside from these annoyances, the camera is fun to use. Software: The included ehe program is OK. Also found Vividia Able Scope which is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK C

customer_reviews.title: ideal for working from home
customer_reviews.text: While working from home during this pandemic, I don't have access to the regular work equipment like a soldering microscope. This tool lets me do that job very nicely. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: RemcoW

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding tool for coin/stamp collectors.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the microscope to help us identify rare coins and catalog them. The camera is very easy to set up and use. It does provide its own light but we find it helpful to use a separate, stonger light source in addition to the scope light. The scope stand is attached to a postcard sized steel stage. Every component breaks down and fits into a small, greeting card sized box for storage. We would strongly recommend this little scope to anyone that has reached the limits of their magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki W.

customer_reviews.title: We needed to make sure that the kids can use them without any issues and they just absolutely love them! We are extremely happy with this purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a few of these scopes last year for our Children's Education Center and they are just what we had been looking for. The clarity of the images and ease of use was a must for us. We needed to make sure that the kids can use them without any issues and they just absolutely love them! We are extremely happy with this purchase and I would also like to mention that their customer service is amazing. We had some basic IT questions and they were very responsive and extremely happy to help. Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Information Technology

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I buy gold, silver, diamonds and jewelry so I have to be able to see very fine details which this scope is perfect for doing this. I have used the camera function often to show someone the quality of a diamond even though they were a thousand miles away. It works well and it is easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice little lab scope.
customer_reviews.text: The dual focus (rack and pinion stand for coarse and straight knurled knob at the cable end for fine) really makes it easy to use. The dimmer on the LEDs is very nice to have. I recommended that my firm buy this to replace a finicky older model made by another company. We have been very happy with this model. We use Digital Viewer for the software, as it has more photo adjustments than the Opti-Tek version.
customer_reviews.author: bbqncigars

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Awesome Zoom, Takes pictures. Great product Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this microscope. Does Everything it says. Zoom is Fantastic! Being able to take a quick snap shot for your file is GREAT. Easy to use! You can use in the base or Free Hand. Comes with different Tips. Light is Super Bright, but has Dimmer. Easy to Install on computer. Reviewed several different microscopes, watched many demos. Picked this one because price was right. Showed it to a friend, now she's buying one for her husband. Yes would recommend for Hobbies +
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad For The Price
customer_reviews.text: The basic problem is that the resolution of the camera is marginal at best (for biological samples) It is possibly quite ok for circuit boards. For 10x more money, you can get something a lot better, so if you really need to put photos in a report or Power Point, this is not for you. For lesser tasks, it is certainly better than a magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.author: Steve SB

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: For the money...it works! We use Mac OS Catelina and the image is reversed. None of the links the vendor sent can be used with that operating system. Too bad. But-if we take a photo can reverse image in that. 10 year old with a coin collection loves it!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!  Opti-Tekscope
customer_reviews.text: Our first microscope - We are enjoying this very much - at the present time we are utilizing it to examine rocks, minerals, gems, and elements. So far so good! My teenager child put this together and the quality of pictures are great. The younger child (tween) is also using it like a pro! It is also parent friendly : ) (couldn't resist) The functionality of the microscope is awesome, the stand is sturdy - when a table is knocked it doesn't look like you just saw an earthquake, clarity of pictures are nice. Zoom in Zoom out - ya, ya - works well.
customer_reviews.author: Acer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected! Wonderfully clear images.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and I to explore random stuff. Works better than expected. Better zoom and clarity than my 2 other regular microscopes and this one can take pictures and videos! I wish I had bought this digital microscope sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for PCB work
customer_reviews.text: The second picture is with the camera all the way up, second is almost all the way down. In the up position there is 4" of clearance, more than enough to work with tools. In the down position there is 1.5" of clearance. Using software from a $20 defunct camera which even controls the LED light. Throw away the CD and find some different software. The software is what keeps me from rating this a solid 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin.
customer_reviews.text: Camera works better than expected. Windows app is basic but works. Get what you pay for and not much else
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Allows for precise adjustments
customer_reviews.text: I started off with one of the cheaper USB Microscopes but after using for a year I wanted something better. The precise height adjustment on this one is a huge difference than the ones that you just bend. It also had a higher resolution image. Well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: DVI

customer_reviews.title: Works best and fast.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for dried blood analysis. Previously I bought a regular microscope. This is far more portable and durable and easy. In about 2 minutes set up and capture an image using photobooth. This has dual focus, and I agree with another post that this is essential. Disgusting was viewing all the wax in my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Also got excellent and quick tech support answers by email when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple to hookup and use on my Mac. Plug the OptiTEK-HD into a USB port and then open Photo Booth and be sure to select the USB camera on the camera window. Also got excellent and quick tech support answers by email when I had a user interface problem (didn't know how to select the right camera). Super easy to adjust both lighting and macro or micro focus with this microscope which is connected to a very stable and precisely built machined aluminum base. Excellent resolution for inspecting small objects, even things that are invisible to the naked eye.
customer_reviews.author: fish

customer_reviews.title: Take macro-photography to the next level
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great for close-up video and still photos. Perfect gift for a biology student or anyone who wants to bring the micro world into view. You can film insect larvae in vernal pool water. You can see pollen coating beetles and other insects. Check out a fly's eyes? No problem, except for the fly.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gallien

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super fun! We use it to identify bugs in our garden, look at interesting rocks, leaves, grass... It also comes with lots of attachments, like for looking in your mouth. We found two cavities messing around in my husbands mouth and he ended up in a dentist chair to correct the situation. No root canals because we caught them early! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Myda C

customer_reviews.title: Works with Linux; great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this USB microscope. The picture is crisp, clear and the delay is not too bad. I bought this for surface mount soldering. It works fine with VLC on Manjaro Linux. I have been using this for well over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Brock M

customer_reviews.title: Really cool camera
customer_reviews.text: PROS Camera works great for multiple months now. Resolution is good and I have used it to solder small components on PCBs Stand mount is convenient. Nice video on higher FPS. CONS Software is very basic. Frame-rate (FPS) always has to be adjusted in software, otherwise movement is choppy when zoomed in/ while recording. No protector for soldering, so I use plastic wrap around the tip.
customer_reviews.author: ggraple

customer_reviews.title: great little thing
customer_reviews.text: wow, for the price it is great. i recommended if you are a electronic hobbyist or biologist wanna be. i read the reviews before purchase and I do not agree with some bad reviews, yes it might need better lighting but this work great if people are looking for more resolution or amplification they need to get a professional microscope.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe D. Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Package came very quickly and is exactly as advertised. Very versatile for adjusting angles and focus. I'm a coin collector and age has crept up on me. My arms are getting a little too short for my eyes (if you know what I mean). Great product!
customer_reviews.author: gymsim

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Had to change the frame rate from the default 14FPS to 60FPS in order to use the camera effectively. I'm very happy with the quality and the imaging. Wish the software had the ability to inverse the image but it's not a big deal. I can probably use another video viewing software which has the feature.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Richard Dannatt

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for viewing my coins
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for viewing my coins. Easy to use and easy to capture photos of your magnified items.
customer_reviews.author: MHarding

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this Opti-Tekscope. Every bit as good as advertised. The simple plug and play with Windows 10 was perfect. It is very sturdy for the money. Focusing is very easy. I am using it for coins to start with. I am sure I will find many more uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Software
customer_reviews.text: What I disliked was the CD that came with the scope. But after having it for a year and cutting through the maze; I contacted the company and it was like a light turned on. It is a great device. I'm very pleased with its ease of use and the image quality. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, easy to use. Very clear picture and solid construction. You’ll get what you pay for! Went through a few cheaper scopes before coughing it up for this one. It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for electronics.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera for looking at electronics. I only wish I ordered more than two of these, (one for home, one for work), so I can give them to others in need of one. I will order more if they become available again.
customer_reviews.author: robert rollins

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with how it works for the price and my ...
customer_reviews.text: I had some trouble getting it work with iMac but the company took time and resolved the problem. I am very satisfied with how it works for the price and my coin,stamp and plant purposes. Good company
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Very good little scope
customer_reviews.text: Very good little scope, focusing is touchy but but not hard, works well on coins which I do mostly and gets very close up pics in nice detail. The soft ware that comes with it is not the best but it works I would recommend this to any one looking for an easy telescopic camera set up.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Microscope good, stand great
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm happy with the camera. I really like the stand the most. Have you tried holding one if these in your hand while trying to focus?
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very cool. I had a SMT on a circuit board that was slightly out of place on a thumb drive. I fixed it with the help of this and was able to get the data. You just have to get used to looking at the screen while you work.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to operate. I leave it on the side of my computer when not in use. Great for Numismatic's.
customer_reviews.author: Mick O.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product...  BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, great value for a small investment. I am taking close-up photos in a manufacturing application and this is working flawlessly! Easy to operate and adjust, and I love the mirror attachment (included) for taking profile pics. The adjustable lighting and easy focus make this a great tool for me. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JBL

customer_reviews.title: Software should be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for soldering these SMD 0402's and below. Works nicely, I don't miss binocular microscope. Would like some alternative focusing method (ring at the tail of the tube is tolerable, but it messes up the aim). The software is bearable, but every few minutes it gets into jerky mode (Windows 7 64bit). Pressing the "capture" button clears that up though. I tried all free alternatives, and did not find anything better. Note: It was a second purchase (a similar listing for less had shipped wrong stand). Got it exactly as pictured here.
customer_reviews.author: MasterOfZen

customer_reviews.title: My Coin Collecting Hobby Just Got A Whole Lot More Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Wow - I am impressed by this scope. It makes my hobby of looking at coins much more enjoyable in that I do not have to use my loops or other handheld magnifiers to look at my coins. I recommend the Opti-Telescope and the seller Top-Peek.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Spear

customer_reviews.title: This is not a toy.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very solid product, not a plastic toy. I have a Linux computer and found the "Cheese" program works great with the camera. Very happy with customer support, they pointed me to the program.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Clarity with multiple adjustments.
customer_reviews.text: Engineering and construction of this unit is excellent. Very easy to assemble. This is an industrial level unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GET ONE !!
customer_reviews.text: Works Very Well when used for looking at coins.. The smallest detail can easily be see clearly..
customer_reviews.author: JamieStarr1999

customer_reviews.title: If something is wrong call number on box!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He went to use it it didn’t look right. Do he called customer service. He explained to the guy what was wrong. They tried a couple different things. Here he downloaded the wrong software. He talked to a Matt he was very helpful. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: mommy of 3

customer_reviews.title: A Bargain for the quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job in my Hearing Aid Office, for a fraction of the cost. Tech support was top notch when I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, this microscope works as described, great value as well as a great seller!! this is really a 6 star review
customer_reviews.author: medwayimports

customer_reviews.title: has very good graphics, its a bit much for my wimpy ...
customer_reviews.text: It magnifies very well, has very good graphics, its a bit much for my wimpy vista computer, but no real complaints a good buy
customer_reviews.author: james j rooney

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this one after returning a ~$25 "microscope"
customer_reviews.text: Works great - built in light source is sometimes inadequate so I created a 3D printed mount for a selfie ring light. Link below - not sure if Amazon will strip it, if so go to thingiverse and look up thing 2739459
customer_reviews.author: Albers LLC

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Used this to setup a turntable tonearm/cartridge SRA. Worked perfect with some mated software. Happy listener now.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Phillips

customer_reviews.title: The seller was very helpful in getting the scope to work on our Chromebook.
customer_reviews.text: Used an excellent Chrome app named LabCamera to work with the Opti-Tekscope to produce very nice JPEG photographs of the microscopic objects we sampled. The lighting, focusing and stand are excellent. A very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Nhat Whilk

customer_reviews.title: Overall worth it
customer_reviews.text: Solid, performance meets my expectations.... wish the base was machined better and focus wheels were a bit finer so viewing and searching was more precise
customer_reviews.author: Lidle Brooke llc

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I wasn't sure what to expect
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I wasn't sure what to expect, but this works perfectly for what I need. The base has a good weight to it. After downloading the app for this, it worked flawlessly with my Samsung S8+. Basically plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: shopsandsnaps

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy a toy, get the USB Microscope that works. High Resolution.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few USB Microscopes, all of them were toys. This one is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Brews72727

customer_reviews.title: Simple, elegant tool for the hobbyist
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little tool for my botanical/gardening hobby. No squinting into an eyepiece - plug it into a USB port and (on a Mac) using photo booth view a full screen image. The design is elegant. If you have a question, call the number on the box and the company owner picks up and is glad to help.
customer_reviews.author: Maune Muncy

customer_reviews.title: Built well and great customer support.
customer_reviews.text: Customer support is great. I wanted to get some better Macintosh software and they helped me out greatly. Fun to play with. I use it to inspect some of my engraving efforts. Its also a pretty solid piece​ of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Anthropod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this to set the SRA on my Lyra Delos. Worth every penny, as it transformed my system!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Opti-Tekscope Digital USB Microscope Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little scope. Easy to use once you figure out how the software functions.
customer_reviews.author: GreenMatter

customer_reviews.title: It a neat thing but I have trouble getting it ...
customer_reviews.text: It a neat thing but I have trouble getting it to work right. I bought it take pictures of small markings. Difficult for me. No instructions. Watched a Youtube video.
customer_reviews.author: tab

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well for looking at coins. Would be even better if it had a higher resolution image but still amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: andrew33433

customer_reviews.title: Good Image and solid stand
customer_reviews.text: Great image on this camera. the Stand is amazing in its own merit! - very well made good friction that is manually set. set the image for 1600 x 1200 and in MJPG in settings and set Preview for live view. - Use the AmCap on the supplied disk is best. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DaveH

customer_reviews.title: Great microscope for cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Great little microscope for cheap! Well made and designed holder too. Works great as an endescope too. The software isnt great, but you just need to know the quirks. Make sure you change the frame rate every time to 40 or so. I have no clue why the default is 14.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price point. No complaints. Only upside.
customer_reviews.text: The microscope is wonderfully effective at this price point. It has already proven very useful in my business for ferreting our fake cards.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Adams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build structure with quality material.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality product, even better than expected. Installation of the software in Windows 10 was smooth and I was up and running in less than 2 minutes. Once set up I did a trial run of the softwares ability. Both still images and video was exceptional. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy caudle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for looking at small stuff a lot better than I thought it would be worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jason E Burgher

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this works great for what I need . I now know when my plants are ready to be picked
customer_reviews.author: Peter Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the focus and the camera quality is unbeatable at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: Great support. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Tec support help solve a operating g system issue quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, GREAT images.
customer_reviews.text: This scope provides excellent images and is easy to use. I can see fine details on the surface mount devices and circuit boards I have to work on these days. I have used it with my MAC and my PCs with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Gillilan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little unit. Hooks up easily, easy to operate, has great resolution and takes very nice snap shots.
customer_reviews.author: uWizz

customer_reviews.title: Good value with one exception
customer_reviews.text: Camera works very well! Good value with one exception. The stand does not securely hold the camera. Once it is focused, the camera wand moves within the holder causing it to go out of focus.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Best tubular scope  for the money.
customer_reviews.text: As described, this scope is exactly what I wanted. Small but very adaptable. Pretty sharp & able to get into very snug places.
customer_reviews.author: Kranastat

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good product. Very useful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine and put it into use. This is a very good product. Very useful and easy to use. The quality of the USB camera is perfectly matched with the very thoughtfully designed zoom/focusing apparatus. The software is also excellent AND no driver to install. I'm quiet floored by this product actually.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good view up close
customer_reviews.text: A very good, affordable USB microscope. Could use a little more lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer support
customer_reviews.text: It's a great microscope. Fine tuning works very well and you can use the builtin Windows camera to view it
customer_reviews.author: Stanley W. Horspool

customer_reviews.title: The best Item I have bought in years.
customer_reviews.text: This Opti-Tekscope is probably the best item I have bought in many years. I have to say, that this has made my pictures of the jewelry I sale look like you can reach into the computer and touch them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it says and just what I wanted. Really pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: David Ecker

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I use it to monitor a razor's ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I use it to monitor a razor's edge while honing it. I can see the fine details which lets me know if the honing is going well as I take the razor from one stone to another. An invaluable tool.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not a great image
customer_reviews.text: The microscope did not focus clearly. I expected the image to be clearer. It is easy to use, but did not suit me needs.
customer_reviews.author: LtAmoc

customer_reviews.title: Great device, used it to identify a customer problem
customer_reviews.text: Great device, used it to identify a customer problem. Clear and sharp picture easy to set up. I use an iMac and Photo booth works great with it. Although no instructions on use come with this microscope, there are some good show and tell on YouTube. Werner
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found it very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I found it very easy to use. I use it for the study of stamps the detail you can see is great .It could be improved with a longer column so you could view the full table width I got round this by making an extension. Overall a great bit of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good product, light keeps going on and off. Pictures are not that clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This simple microscope works great! When I had trouble downloading the application software
customer_reviews.text: This simple microscope works great! When I had trouble downloading the application software, Matt at OptiTek Scope was very friendly and solved my problem quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and high quality for the price, I took it out, set it up, and was using it all in 10 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: well made stand and great image detail
customer_reviews.text: the stand is well made and goes up and down smoothly, very stable. the picture on my monitor is the black lines of a 20$ bill, it will zoom very close and has a pretty good focal range too.
customer_reviews.author: Sergi T

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and affordable magnification
customer_reviews.text: Great image quality compared to others I’ve used, easy setup, sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: K N

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time and in great shape. Best of all it works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and in great shape. Best of all it works as advertised. Took some fooling around with to learn how everything works. Good instructions would be nice. Has worked well for the few months i have had it.
customer_reviews.author: TM2

product_meta.title: Opti-Tekscope Digital USB Microscope Camera- Advanced CMOS Sensor, True High Definition Macro 200x Zoom Imaging –1600 x 1200, Video, Superior Industrial Quality Base, 8 LED, Windows Mac Linux Chrome!
product_meta.description:
Need to be able to see something up close to examine fine details, troubleshoot a problem, take HD photos for collections or sales, or simply study its every detail fully? Wherever you choose to use it the OPTI-TEKSCOPE OT-HD DIGITAL USB CAMERA- MICROSCOPE- ENDOSCOPE is the ideal instrument to reach for whenever you need to see things in richer detail. 

 The OPTI-TEKSCOPE OT-HD can be used in three different ways: 

 - As a conventional microscope with up to 200x magnification
- As an endoscope for examining the ears, nose & throat
- As a USB web camera with the focal distance set to infinity

 Versatile and simple to use, the OPTI-TEKSCOPE features eight LEDs that dim and brighten to provide optimal lighting conditions around the camera lens. The wide focal range of 5 millimeters to 30 millimeters gives you the freedom to examine objects and specimens as closely or as distantly as necessary. 

 You can use the microscope to view details live while connected to your Windows or Mac computer. Once you have the camera connected, you can take still photos and save them or capture AVI video at a frame rate of 30fps at 640x480. 

 With its solid aluminum adjustable stand, the OPTI-TEKSCOPE OT-HD is ideal for: 

 - Magnifying stamps, coins & watches for appraisals and repairs
- Studying insects & other living or preserved specimens
- Manufacturing & repairing printed circuit boards
- Performing fine detail work on crafts or hobbies
- Examining skin and other tissue samples
- Much more

 Software driver supplied on a CD-ROM disk (standard size 120mm) or can be downloaded from our website or through an email link. 

 Order the OPTI-TEKSCOPE OT-HD USB DIGITAL SCOPE today!
feature_bullets: SEE EVERY DETAIL CLEARLY Advanced CMOS sensor provides high-definition 1600x1200 resolution, so you can fully view fine details

PLUG AND PLAY- for Windows 10 and Mac- simply use the Camera App already installed on Windows 10 or Chromebook. For Mac open and run the Photo Booth application already installed on the Mac. Additional software for Windows and Mac supplied. Contact us for additional software options if needed.

PROFESSIONAL DESIGN Aluminum construction makes this microscope durable enough for daily use on the job, but it's also lightweight and easy to store for home use. Full size software and instructions disc included
CAPTURE FOOTAGE WHILE YOU EXAMINE YOUR SAMPLE With the USB cable connecting the microscope to your computer you can capture live AVI video or record images in BMP format
FULLY ADJUSTABLE LIGHTING Includes a total of 8 LED lights that you can dim or brighten to provide the perfect light conditions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars269 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
